lead_paragraph: Australia pace bowler James Pattinson has suffered a recurrence of shin soreness that kept him on the sidelines for much of January and been ordered to rest for the remainder of the season.

headline.print_headline: Pattinson Ordered to Rest After Recurrence of Shin Pain
headline.main: Pattinson Ordered to Rest After Recurrence of Shin Pain

snippet: Australia pace bowler James Pattinson has suffered a recurrence of shin soreness that kept him on the sidelines for much of January and been ordered to rest for the remainder of the season....
